MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke On Trent, affecting properties in Talke Road and surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the repairs required and difficult conditions on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:57PM on 14th April 2021
